description: Our survey of travelcards tells us how customers are using them, and raises money for charity

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Working with the Rail Delivery Group, we run an ongoing survey on Travelcards to help us understand how they are used and to raise money for charity."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

We distribute thousands of Travelcard surveys every year for customers to record their journeys on public transport. We cannot get this data from Oyster records alone because customers using Travelcards on Oyster do not necessarily need to touch in and out when travelling within their ticket's zones.
For each diary completed and returned to us, we donate £2 split equally between our four nominated registered charities:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"http://www.asthma.org.uk/\"\u003eAsthma UK\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"http://www.rspb.org.uk\"\u003eThe Royal Society for the Protection of Birds\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://www.mariecurie.org.uk/\"\u003eMarie Curie\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"http://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/\"\u003eCitizens Advice Bureau\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Customers have helped us raise more than £489,775 as of May 2019. Our latest donation shared £1,854 among our nominated charities.
You may receive a Travelcard diary through the post or by email, or one of our surveyors may offer you a diary at a station.
The diaries are simple to fill in and free to return, see below for more detail on completing a diary.
Every diary we get back is useful, so thanks to all of you who have helped out with the survey so far.
When completing diaries, please remember to:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Record all trips, including return trips","Record trips on London Overground and TfL Rail as 'Rail'","Record trips on different modes separately, for example if you take the Tube to Finsbury Park and then change to National Rail, record the trips as separate entries on the diary"]}
The four charities selected to receive the Travelcard survey donation were chosen to reflect a wide range of  public interests.
We are not actively looking at the moment for any other charities to join the survey.
